QuestData.Title: Give Peace a Chance
QuestData.Description:
Light be with you, $p.
This expedition is under the protection of both the Horde and Alliance. Our orders are clear: give aid to any members of the expedition, regardless of their other allegiances.
The Horde's representatives, Warlord Grimaxe and her daughter Shuja, stand guard on the other side of camp.
I fought with Warlord Grimaxe against the scourge. She is noble and will serve this expedition well.
Go offer her your assistance. Show her that the Alliance honors its commitments.
QuestData.LogDescription: Introduce yourself to the Horde representatives.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Warlord Breka Grimaxe in Wingrest Embassy.
